data.text: Thus saith the Lord,
For all those things hath mine hand made,
He that killeth an ox is as if he slew a man;
I also will choose their delusions,
Hear the word of the Lord, ye that tremble at his word;
A voice of noise from the city, a voice from the temple,
Before she travailed, she brought forth;
Who hath heard such a thing? who hath seen such things?
Shall I bring to the birth, and not cause to bring forth? saith the Lord:
Rejoice ye with Jerusalem, and be glad with her, all ye that love her:
That ye may suck, and be satisfied with the breasts of her consolations;
For thus saith the Lord,
As one whom his mother comforteth, so will I comfort you;
And when ye see this, your heart shall rejoice,
For behold, the Lord will come with fire,
For by fire and by his sword will the Lord plead with all flesh:
They that sanctify themselves, and purify themselves in the gardens
For I know their works and their thoughts:
And I will set a sign among them,
And they shall bring all your brethren for an offering unto the Lord out of all nations
And I will also take of them for priests and for Levites, saith the Lord.
For as the new heavens and the new earth, which I will make,
And it shall come to pass, that from one new moon to another,
And they shall go forth, and look
